text: James Wilkes Noble (March 5, 1922 â€“ March 28, 2016) was an American actor. He was best known for his role of the sweet-natured but naive Governor on ABC's 1980s sitcom Benson. He was born in Dallas, Texas. He retired from acting in 2010. Noble died from complications of a stroke at his home in Norwalk, Connecticut on March 28, 2016, aged 94. ==References== ==Other websites== * *James Noble at the University of Wisconsin's Actors Studio audio collection *James Noble (Aveleyman) Category:1922 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Dallas
title: James Noble (actor)
